DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ONO-2333Ms in patients with Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.brief_title: Placebo-Controlled Study of ONO-2333Ms in Patients With Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with recurrent major depressive disorder Patients with treatment resistance for depression History of alcohol abuse/dependence, substance abuse/dependence within 6 months Has clinically significant unstable medical condition Has significant risk of suicide
